an4.112:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno anganteva sankham gacchati.
an4.112:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti, rajabhoggo, ranno anganteva sankham gacchati.
an4.112:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an4.112:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
